data.name: qryListe2.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @Data Table( FaLeistungID INT, Grund INT )
---------------------------------- ---------- Collect Data ---------------------------------- INSERT INTO @Data SELECT FAL_V.FaLeistungID, Grund = FAL_V.AbschlussgrundCode FROM dbo.FaLeistung FAL_V WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL_V.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID WHERE FAL_V.ModulID = 5 -- Vormundschaft AND FAL_V.FaProzessCode = 505 -- Vormundschaftlicher Auftrag AND {edtAuswertungsjahr} = YEAR(FAL_V.DatumBis) -- Fall im Auswertungsjahr abgeschlossen AND OUU.OrgUnitID IN (SELECT OrgUnitID FROM dbo.XOrgUnit WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE ModulID = 3 AND ParentID = 28) -- es sollen nur Einträge der Sektion Jugendamt angezeigt werden --- AND OUU.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID} --- AND USR.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID}
------------------------------------------ ------------ Result Table ------------------------------------------ DECLARE @Result TABLE( Abteilung VARCHAR(100), SAR VARCHAR(100), [Abbruch] INT, [vorm.Mandat] INT, [f.m.Zuständ.] INT, [Unabh.SH] INT, [k.vorm.Massn.] INT, [Todesfall] INT, [Überw.Dritte] INT, [Wegzug] INT, [Volljähr.] INT, [Adopt.vollz.] INT, [Auftr.erfüllt] INT, [Umplatz.] INT, [Rückpl.z.Elt.] INT, [andere] INT, [Total] INT, Sortkey1$ INT, Sortkey2$ INT )
------- Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT MAX(ORG.ItemName), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Total Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, 'Total', SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 17 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 16 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 36 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 31 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 32 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 33 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 34 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 35 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund IN (10,17,16,36,12,8,11,7,31,32,33,34,35,15) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ORG.OrgUnitID, 2 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Leerzeile pro Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, 3 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- pro SAR INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, MAX(USR.LastName + ISNULL(', ' + USR.FirstName,'')), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 17 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 16 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 36 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 31 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 32 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 33 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 34 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 35 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund IN (10,17,16,36,12,8,11,7,31,32,33,34,35,15) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), MAX(ORG.OrgUnitID), 1 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY USR.UserID
------- Total INSERT INTO @Result SELECT 'Total', NULL, SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 17 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 16 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 36 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 31 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 32 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 33 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 34 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 35 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund = 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Grund IN (10,17,16,36,12,8,11,7,31,32,33,34,35,15) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 9999999, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID
------ just cosmetics UPDATE @Result SET [Abbruch] = CASE WHEN [Abbruch] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Abbruch] END, [vorm.Mandat] = CASE WHEN [vorm.Mandat] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [vorm.Mandat] END, [f.m.Zuständ.] = CASE WHEN [f.m.Zuständ.] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [f.m.Zuständ.] END, [Unabh.SH] = CASE WHEN [Unabh.SH] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Unabh.SH] END, [k.vorm.Massn.] = CASE WHEN [k.vorm.Massn.] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [k.vorm.Massn.] END, [Todesfall] = CASE WHEN [Todesfall] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Todesfall] END, [Überw.Dritte] = CASE WHEN [Überw.Dritte] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Überw.Dritte] END, [Wegzug] = CASE WHEN [Wegzug] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Wegzug] END, [Volljähr.] = CASE WHEN [Volljähr.] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Volljähr.] END, [Adopt.vollz.] = CASE WHEN [Adopt.vollz.] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Adopt.vollz.] END, [Auftr.erfüllt] = CASE WHEN [Auftr.erfüllt] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Auftr.erfüllt] END, [Umplatz.] = CASE WHEN [Umplatz.] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Umplatz.] END, [Rückpl.z.Elt.] = CASE WHEN [Rückpl.z.Elt.] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Rückpl.z.Elt.] END, [andere] = CASE WHEN [andere] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [andere] END WHERE SAR <> 'Total' AND isNull(Abteilung, '') <> 'Total'
SELECT * FROM @Result ORDER BY Sortkey1$, Abteilung DESC, Sortkey2$, SAR

data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
